https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cO9HFdT4HBwqNPW06h1s3Q9wHVH.jpg When a barrage of meteors hurtles through the atmosphere straight for Mayor Anna McPherson's town, Anna must lead the desperate fight to save the town and her family from the flaming balls of destruction shooting down from the sky.
